title: What champ should I obtain/try out?
body:
So I've been playing aatrox as my main for a while and I've been looking to play a champ similar to aatrox I've been having fun with jarvan but I'd like a top lane focused champ because all my experience is virtually from top lane.

What I want in  champ

-some form of sustain 

- bruiser(most important )

-escape/gap closer

-has presence in team fights

- has poke

A champion doesn't have to have all these factors just some of them 

I hope you guys have some interesting suggestions for me!
